sQuestion: At the beginning of a walk , Roberto and Juanita are 6.6 miles apart. If they leave at the same time and walk in the same direction , Roberto overtakes Juanita in 11 hours. If they walk towards each other , they meet in 1 hour. What are their speeds?

sentences.sentence: At the beginning of a walk , Roberto and Juanita are 6.6 miles apart.
If they leave at the same time and walk in the same direction , Roberto overtakes Juanita in 11 hours.
If they walk towards each other , they meet in 1 hour.
